sentences.en: " Ouch! " cried the principal. " there is a thumbtack in this chair. "
sentences.cn: “ 哎哟, ” 校长叫道, “ 这把椅子上有颗图钉. ”

sentences.en: "It was my big hope that people would get [the message] right away and at least put a thumbtack on the map as far as our location, " Buck said.
sentences.cn: “我最大的愿望是希望人们能够立即收到（这条信息），哪怕在我们所处地方的地图上钉一枚图钉也好。” Buck说。

sentences.en: Also there is a more sarcastic way, which is not recommended, that is, put a thumbtack into the tire.
sentences.cn: 还有一种更损的方式，不值得推荐，那就是在车胎上按上个图钉。

sentences.en: He pinned up the notice with a thumbtack.
sentences.cn: 他用图钉将通知挂起来.

sentences.en: I press the thumbtack into the board with thumb.
sentences.cn: 我用大拇指将图钉按在木板上.

sentences.en: Someone pulls the thumbtack out of the tire, which makes it hard for the owner to find where the hole is.
sentences.cn: 有人按了图钉再拔下来，这样车主找不到窟窿在哪儿，补胎时更困难。

sentences.en: The thumbtack pricked his index finger.
sentences.cn: 大头针扎了他一下手指.

trans.tran_en: a short pin with a flat top that is used for fixing notices on walls
